short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Guard reminds you to focus when you try to access distracting websites by redirecting you to the Focus page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Guard redirects you to the Focus page to remind you to focus when accessing distracting websites.

Focus Guard is a dedicated software application designed to safeguard your focus and protect your productivity while using your computer. Focus Guard is your trusted ally, whether you're a student, professional, or anyone striving to minimize distractions during work or study sessions.

ðŸš€ Discover Focus Guard Extension! ðŸš€

ðŸ”’ Personalized Website Guidance & Attention Redirection!

Focus Guard is an innovative Chrome extension that lets you control your online experience! No more wandering through web pages. With Focus Guard, you can precisely define which parts of the pages you want to highlight in a way that suits your preferences!

ðŸŽ¯ Set Custom Focus Rules!
Select the domains or URLs and configure which sections should be highlighted. You can choose which content to emphasize through in-page redirection while allowing users to browse freely!

ðŸš« Custom Redirections, Not Distractions!
With redirection to the Focus Message, the extension reminds you to Focus on your work. You can instantly close the tab and continue your work even in the browser without getting distracted instead of working.

ðŸŽ‰ Change Whenever You Want!
Focus Guard lets you alter the focused areas anytime you desire! Type the desired rules/URLs into the input box, and you can add or remove focus rules with a single click. Total control is always at your fingertips!

ðŸŒŸ Focus Guard: Rethinking Browsing!
Forget traditional website blocking! Focus Guard helps you create the desired browsing environment, emphasizing practicality and individual needs. Nurture concentration, create unique attention redirection, and indulge your focus in content that matters to you!

â€¼ With Focus Guard 2.0.0 you get also:
- Dark/light mode 
- Customly translated/editable languages (currently only LTR (left to right are supported))
- Distraction attempts to counter the table.
- Up to 10 website rules lists & unlimited website rules
